requirements: Complete the Envisaged Echoes challenge(s) for 1 character(s)
Complete the Envisaged Echoes challenge(s) for 3 character(s)
Complete the Envisaged Echoes challenge(s) for 5 character(s)
Complete an entire Imaginarium Theater show in Visionary Mode.

Complete an entire show in the Imaginarium Theater having obtained 8 Stella.
Complete an entire show in the Imaginarium Theater having obtained 10 Stella.
